title: STK operates locations across multiple countries and continents
statement: STK Steakhouse has restaurant locations in the United States, Canada, Mexico, Qatar, United Arab Emirates, England, and Italy.

citations.quote: Locations listed include: Arizona, California, Colorado, D.C., Florida, Georgia, Illinois, Massachusetts, Mexico Los Cabos, Nevada, New York, North Carolina, Puerto Rico, Tennessee, Texas, Utah, Washington, Ontario Canada, Toronto, Qatar Doha, UAE Dubai, England London, Italy Milan
